content: प्रसरः {@--1@} Going forward, advancing; <ls>Ś. 1. 29.</ls> {@--2@} Free or unimpeded motion, free scope; access or course; <ls>R. 8. 23</ls>; <ls n="R.">16. 20</ls>; <ls>Mu. 3. 5</ls>; <ls>H. 1. 186.</ls> {@--3@} Spreading, diffusion, extension, expansion, dilation; <ls>Śi. 9. 71.</ls> {@--4@} Extent, dimension, great quantity; <ls>Śi. 3. 35.</ls> {@--5@} Prevalence, influence; <ls>Ś. 3. 10.</ls> {@--6@} A stream, flow, torrent, flood; पपात स्वेदांबुप्रसर इव हर्ष श्रुनिकरः <ls>Gīt. 11.</ls> {@--7@} A group, multitude. {@--8@} War, battle. {@--9@} An iron arrow. {@--10@} Speed. {@--11@} Affectionate solicitation. {@--12@} (In medicine) Morbid displacement of the humours of the body. {@--13@} Destruction, ruin.
